main event: A reported sighting of a circular, solid object in the sky over Rivergrove, Illinois, in November 1965.
interesting points: The object was reported to be stationary yet moved from east to west and had an erratic flight path,The object was described as circular and solid in appearance,The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes and was first noticed by children before the observer called the Air Force,There were no discernible features or sounds associated with the object,The weather conditions during the sighting were described as clear.
witness description: A civilian individual (identity redacted) who observed the object on multiple occasions and reported it to the Air Force.
